title: Dear Beloved Spouse
description: I've always tried to force myself to learn depending on only me, myself and I, I had always dreamed of building a future for me, graduating school then building some project to live on totally ALONE, but you know what?, while all this dreaming I've forgot that if you dreamed about flying high you would fall down hard and break your neck.	At this very exact moment I've fallen hard and my neck was broken, I'm being forced into a marriage I don't want, to someone I can't stand, I can't fathom the thought of living my life with this man, my dearest beloved within minutes to be husband my lovely cousin Kerim. Dear Beloved Spouse first romantic novela for the author Sama R.K
author: Sama R.K.
